 Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 13-May-2011.)
statement:
exlimih.1 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
exlimih.2 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
exlimih $p |- ( E. x ph -> ps ) $.
